attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that a maximum of £100k per annum should be paid to the most qualified entertainer, journalist or DJ.  Current salaries would never be approved by voters if a national referendum was held. They are simply out of all proportion. In summary; J Paxman receives £1M per annum, J Ross has a stagering 3 year deal worth £18 million, G Norton has a woping £5M contract and T Wogan earns £800k per annum. C Moyles receives £630k per annum. These salaries for public service are out of proportion when considering their actual talent.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
